thread.title: Simbu-Selvaraghavan's Kaan put on hold?
thread.title_full: Simbu-Selvaraghavan's Kaan put on hold? - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Simbu-Selvaraghavan's Kaan put on hold?
text:
Trouble for Simbu doesn't seem to stop at all. The latest buzz is that the shoot of his upcoming action thriller movie 'Kaan' with director Selvaraghavan's has been stalled due to financial issues. The first look poster of the was film released a few months ago and shooting for the film had also taken place for a few days. Now with the producers of the film in financial trouble, the film has been put on cold storage.
It is said that the shoot for the movie will begin only after the team gets proper funding. Produced by Selva's wife Gitanjali and Siddharth Rao under Glo Studios, the film stars Simbu, Taapsee and Catherine Tresa in the lead roles with Jagapathi Babu and Suresh playing important roles in the action adventure film. Yuvan Shankar Raja is scoring the music, Arvind Krishna is handling the camera.
